node.title: Building a New Internet From the Ground Up – Part 4: Network
node.excerpt: We're (finally) back with part 4, looking at the networking aspects of the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: Why is ThreeFold P2P Cloud the better solution for customers than Amazon Web Services or Microsoft Azure?
node.excerpt: As we’ve recently been exploring decentralized projects to see where ThreeFold is in the space and where we stand out, we thought it’s a good time to also look into how we compare to traditional, centralized cloud providers.

node.title: How ThreeFold Can Truly Decentralize Blockchain
node.excerpt: Is a blockchain truly decentralized if it is being hosted on a centralized solution? We say, no.

node.title: Building a New Internet From the Ground Up – Part 3: Compute
node.excerpt: Part three of an approachable series on the inner workings of the ThreeFold Grid. This time, we're exploring compute.

node.title: Interview – Designing Solutions for a P2P Future
node.excerpt: An interview with Jonas Delrue from Jimber, the team developing P2P solutions like video chat and office workspace, using the Digital Twin platform. Digital Twin is a use case on top of the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: This ThreeFold Farm Keeps Veggies Warm

node.title: Into the Fold – The ThreeFold Movement
node.excerpt: It's not by mistake that you're here, reading this post. You can feel that a global shift is happening. And you want to do something about it.

node.title: The ThreeFold Grid is by the People, For the People
node.excerpt: ThreeFold's open source technology powers the peer-to-peer Internet revolution that holds the premise to disrupt the global Internet in many ways.

node.title: How ThreeFold Will Give Internet to 43% of the World’s Population
node.excerpt: Proper access to the Internet helps to protect people’s freedom of speech and thought, as well as access to knowledge and information.

node.title: It's Time We Stand Up For Our Data
node.excerpt: As consumers, we should be able to trust that our data is truly safe and secure. And today, we cannot. It's time we stand up for what is ours.

node.title: A Smart Contract for all IT workloads
node.excerpt: The Smart Contract for IT allows you, your company or your community to execute the storage and running of your files and applications securely with consensus and automatic billing.

node.title: How ThreeFold offers Data Sovereignty

node.title: ThreeFold’s Planet Positive Plan
node.excerpt: ThreeFold is taking not just a sustainable approach, we’re setting the plan for a planet positive Internet.

node.title: We Need a More Inclusive Internet
node.excerpt: Today we are working with partners in the clean energy and network / connectivity to build the solutions that are needed to provide fair and uninterrupted internet access with all corners of the world.

node.title: What Is Peer-to-Peer and Why Is It so Important?
node.excerpt: P2P systems are network, not linear or pyramidal hierarchies (though they may share some elements)..

node.title: A Better Solution for Our Planet
node.excerpt: We believe IT can be sustainable. Actually, it should be! That's why energy efficiency has always been a key focus of ours..

node.title: ThreeFold's Long Story Short
node.excerpt: The truth is that ThreeFold is a big project. Here we will try to make things a little simpler for you.

node.title: Why Anyone Should Consider Becoming A (ThreeFold) Farmer
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Foundation is changing the way how "we" as a whole approach the internet and its underlying technology..

node.title: An Intro to the ThreeFold Token
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Token (TFT) is a decentralized digital currency used to buy autonomous and decentralized Internet services (compute, storage, and application) on the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: An escape from the Great Hack
node.excerpt: I can’t help but think how unfair it is that in today’s digital society, people are being treated like products, because there is no such thing as a ‘free’ platform without YOU being the product.

node.title: Decentralizing the Internet
node.excerpt: In this article, we discuss the general concept of a ‘decentralized grid’ and how anyone can plug-in capacity to the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: Co-create the new Internet. Participate with TFT!

node.title: The need for a sustainable digital currency
node.excerpt: Cryptocurrencies commonly face some major problems, which can be solved.

node.title: A new approach to the Internet Architecture
node.excerpt: The Edge internet needs a different approach. So, we started as from scratch and shaped a totally new approach..

node.title: Datacenter Myths
node.excerpt: Hyperscale realities are very different to what most people think. Myth 1 - Bigger data centers are more efficient.

node.title: The need for ThreeFold's neutral internet
node.excerpt: The Internet is no longer the neutral place it used to be. +80% of the Internet capacity is delivered by a handful of companies.
